General.Name: Pelatro PLC
General.Description: Pelatro Plc provides information management software and related services primarily to providers of telecommunication services. The company offers mViva customer engagement hub, a suite of solutions designed for deep engagement between telecommunication companies and its customers. Its mVivia suite offers solutions for contextual campaign management, loyalty management, and data monetization. The company also provides software maintenance and support services; and consultancy services and/or training relating to the use of the software. It serves in the Caribbean, Eastern Europe, the Middle East, North Africa, South Asia, South East Asia, and Sub-Saharan Africa. Pelatro Plc was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 49 Queen Victoria Street, London, United Kingdom, EC4N 4SA

1.Name: Mr. Sudeesh  Yezhuvath B. Tech, B.Tech.
